SageTVPlugin.Name: Network Encoder Monitor
SageTVPlugin.Description: This plugin will monitor all configured Network Monitor Encoders defined on SageTV to check their status. If Functioning=false, and the encoder comes online, Network Encoder will mark it again as true without need of a restart of SageTV
SageTVPlugin.Author: Jabroni
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes:
1.1.1
* Small bugfix on the email message sent
1.1
* Added the ability to send the notification via email (Be sure to check the plugin configuration for the mail server settings)
1.0
* First Release.
After installing, configure the plugin. Select which of the Network Tuners you want to monitor, how often (in seconds). Any change done of tunners and/or
timer requires a restart by clicking the last button on the config screen.
